body: 'Well there is hardly something which uou can expect when buying this blanket I got this for 150 however did not find it that well to suit the price Quality is very very poor but there is nothing much you can expect when you pay 150'

title: 'Not smooth and soft but worth the price'
body: 'This Fleece blanket is rough on skin and not comfortable except in really cold conditions. The price is very less and for that money
column5: I do not expect more quality than this'

title: 'Very low quality'
body: It's not at all a blanket. I'm very disappointed.

title: 'The blanket is good enough for the price but the seller is lying about dimentions.'
body: It's definitely not 2.4L x 1.35W Meters. It's more like 2.0L x 1.3W meters. That's a pretty big difference.

title: 'Ok ok'
body: 'Expensive for this kind of quality like comfort and thickness. This is light weight no doubt but quality is bad.'

title: 'Light and soft'
body: It's light and soft, perfect as an ac blanket, for light chilly evenings and for even as a rug for cold tiled floors. I've used it as a sofa throw. Quality is ok though I'm not sure how it'll stand up to a machine wash. Probably best to hand wash the first time. All in all, at that price its a good buy
